params.name: fdkAfterburner
params.label: Enable afterburner feature if set to 1, disabled if set to 0. This improves the quality but also the required processing power.
params.description: Enable afterburner feature if set to 1, disabled if set to 0. This improves the quality but also the required processing power.

params.name: fdkElbSdr
params.label: Enable SBR (Spectral Band Replication) for ELD.
params.description: Enable SBR (Spectral Band Replication) for ELD.

params.name: fdkLatm
params.label: Output LATM/LOAS encapsulated data if set to 1, disabled if set to 0.
params.description: Output LATM/LOAS encapsulated data if set to 1, disabled if set to 0.

params.name: x264Signaling
params.label: Signaling
params.description:
Set SBR/PS signaling style.

It can assume one of the following values:

'default'
choose signaling implicitly (explicit hierarchical by default, implicit if global header is disabled)

'implicit'
implicit backwards compatible signaling

'explicit_sbr'
explicit SBR, implicit PS signaling

'explicit_hierarchical'
explicit hierarchical signaling

params.name: fdkVbr
params.label: VBR
params.description:
Set VBR mode, from 1 to 5. 1 is lowest quality (though still pretty good) and 5 is highest quality. A value of 0 will disable VBR, and CBR (Constant Bit Rate) is enabled.

Currently only the 'aac_low' profile supports VBR encoding.

params.name: fdkHeaderPeriod
params.label: Header Period
params.description: Set StreamMuxConfig and PCE repetition period (in frames) for sending in-band configuration buffers within LATM/LOAS transport layer.
